comment.body: Not sure how I missed that, but it's pretty awesome :)
What is that movie? It looks a bit like Matrix. :>
@ZAlex: As far as I can tell, it looks more like one of the direct-to-video (or were they?) sequels ;)
@ZAlex: I knew that, but back in the time my memories come from, there were only one kind of SUSE ;)

I'm way over my head, but wouldn't algorithm used by redundant storage solutions out there (GlusterFS, Tahoe-LAFS, Ceph, most advanced forms of (network-)RAID, ...) be able to learn us a thing or two?

> The only thing left on my ZeroMux Big File Sharing Program is to write a very simple tutorial on how to download Python 2.7.
Who doesn't have Python already installed anyway? ;)
Just out of curiosity : why the Tkinter dependency?
